info.name: DownThemAll - Remove 3.x GUI Clutter
info.description: DownThemAll 3.x switched to a more distracting "Donate!" button and added an actions sidebar which duplicates the actions already offered in the context menu. Remove them to go back to the simple elegance of the 2.x UI.
info.additionalInfo: If you use this style, please do consider donating to DownThemAll. As much as I can't stand having the new donation button jump out in the corner of my eye, DTA is still one of my favourite time-saving tools.
